dl.dd: Located 6.5 km east of Brooklyn, Hants County just off Route 14.

h4.a: Click here for a park map

html.p: Offering a 86 site campground, picnic area, playground and walking trails. The campground has water outlets and a trailer dump station as well as a heated comfort station with flush toilets.
WiFi is available at the admin building only and the surrounding area. There will be a password needed, please see the park receptionists.
